alert.note: Alert for Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 10 at 9:22AM MST until November 10 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Periods of light snow this morning. Additional snow accumulations up to 1/2 inch. * WHERE...Musselshell, Northeastern Yellowstone, Southwestern Yellowstone, Treasure, and Northern Rosebud. * WHEN...Until Noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous.
info.instruction: Persons are urged to stay indoors until conditions improve. If you must go outside, dress in layers. Several layers of clothes will keep you warmer than a single heavy coat. Cover exposed skin to reduce your risk of frostbite or hypothermia. Gloves, a scarf, and a hat will keep you from losing your body heat. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Musselshell; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Rosebud; Southwestern Yellowstone; Treasure
